alert.note: Alert for Dare; Tyrrell (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 8:19PM EDT until June 17 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Dare County in eastern North Carolina... Northern Tyrrell County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 819 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Columbia, or 20 miles south of Weeksville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alligator, Gum Neck, Mashoes, Manteo, Columbia, East Lake, Newfoundland, Buffalo City and Frying Pan Landing. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
